articles.title: Sensex jumps over 300 points, Nifty regains 13,700 level; ONGC, Tata Motors among top gainers - Times Now
articles.description: Gains in the market were led by banking, auto, FMCG and metal stocks. ONGC was the top gainer in the Nifty, up 4% followed by Tata Motors and Bajaj Auto
articles.content: New Delhi: The BSE Sensex and the Nifty opened higher on Thursday tracking positive Asian shares, which rose after European Union closed in on a free-trade deal. Asof 9:20 am, The Sensex was up 297 p… [+1358 chars]

articles.title: Mumbai ulemas say no to Chinese vaccine with pork gelatin - India Today
articles.description: Muslim scholars in Mumbai have said that any vaccine with pork gelatin is not permissible for people from the religion under Islamic laws. They have raised alarm over a Chinese vaccine which allegedly contains pork gelatin.
articles.content: At a time when everyone is waiting for the arrival of a coronavirus vaccine, ulemas or Muslim scholars met in Mumbai and decided that vaccines with pork gelatin cannot be administered to any Muslim.… [+1697 chars]

articles.title: Rapid expansion, random wage cuts: behind the Wistron violence - The Indian Express
articles.description: Production at the plant at Narasapura in Kolar district around 60 km from Bengaluru, employing 1,343 regular workers and 8,490 contract workers, was suspended following the violence.
